attributes.action: To make Crohn's disease a disability as it's a life-time illness
attributes.additional_details:
Life is really hard but the council won't do anything as it's not a disability. We've tried to get pip but no.
You need your own personal toilet 
You can't work full time 
Once every 2 years min your having operations
attributes.background: My wife has suffered for many years. We are in a council flat with 1 toilet and life is really hard. We have requested 2 toilets as we can't even let the kids use it as she needs access 24/7.
